applyRotation

public void applyRotation(float x,
                          float y)
Description copied from interface: IPlaceable
Sets rotation to this object. Place object in direction of the vector. Try to not use this method in the loop due to high computation difficulty;

Specified by:
applyRotation in interface IPlaceable
Overrides:
applyRotation in class AbstractItem
Parameters:
x - - x coordinate of this vector
y - - y coordinate of this vector
